vehicle.assemblytasks

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • vehicle.assemblytasks.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CargoTask, CheckCertification, InstallPart

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Represents an assembly task that can be performed on a vehicle.

      abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Workstation> getResponsibleWorkstation()
      Returns the type of workstation in which this task can be performed.

      Returns the time this task took to be performed, or throws an IllegalStateException if this task is not yet performed.

    • Method Detail

      • isPerformed

        public boolean isPerformed()
        true if this task has been performed.

      • perform

        public void perform(Workstation ws,
           int time)
        Sets this task to performed. This change can not be undone.
        Parameters:
        ws - the workstation in which this task is being performed.
        time - the time it took to complete this task.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if this task is not a currently pending task of the given workstation.

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        Returns the time this task took to be performed, or throws an IllegalStateException if this task is not yet performed.

      • getResponsibleWorkstation

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends Workstation> getResponsibleWorkstation()
        Returns the type of workstation in which this task can be performed.
